_Heather Hamilton_: Hypochondriac[1]. “It is because of my dog that I 
have been smitten with an Ovarian Cyst®; it is because of my dog that my 
husband can't breathe with phlegm-free lungs. I can safely blame the dog for 
everything.”



[1] http://www.dooce.com/mtarchives/10_01_2002.html
